name: gauss_4dfp
description: Applies a Gaussian filter to 4dfp or conc input files.

inputs.name: 4dfp or conc input file
inputs.description: Input 4dfp or conc file to be processed.

inputs.name: Half frequency
inputs.description: Half frequency in 1/cm for the Gaussian filter application (f_half is the half frequency in 1/cm).

inputs.name: Output root name
inputs.description: Root name for the output file. Default is <inroot>_g<10*f_half>.

inputs.name: Output endian
inputs.description: Specify output endian; 'b' for big or 'l' for little endian. Default is input endian.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
